title: Patriotic Price Gouging, Trump Begging For Jet Money 3.14.22
itunes:title: Patriotic Price Gouging, Trump Begging For Jet Money 3.14.22
description:
In episode 1203, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by producer, writer, and podcaster Oz Woloshyn to discuss Trump Heat Check, PATRIOTS AT THE PUMP!, Daniel Kaluuya and more!

  1. Trump Heat Check
  2. MAGA-world fails to flock to Truth Social
  3. Congressional Republicans Have Found Their Red Line
  4. PATRIOTS AT THE PUMP!
  5. The GOP’s Four Biggest Lies About Joe Biden and Fossil Fuels

 

Visit: kaleidoscope.nyc

Oz's Podcasts: Forgotten: Women of Juárez    Sleepwalkers

LISTEN: Champion by Liam Bailey

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
